user_stories.title: User Registration via Email
user_stories.user_story: As a new user, I want to register using my email address so that I can create an account and access the platform.
acceptance_criteria: User can enter a valid email address and password.
System validates the email format and password strength.
User receives a confirmation email after registration.
User cannot register with an already registered email.
Registration is successful only if all required fields are filled.

user_stories.title: User Registration via Social Media
user_stories.user_story: As a new user, I want to register using my social media accounts so that I can quickly create an account.
acceptance_criteria: User can select from supported social media platforms (e.g., Google, Facebook).
System authenticates with the selected social media provider.
User account is created upon successful authentication.
User is notified if authentication fails.
User can link multiple social media accounts to their profile.

user_stories.title: User Login
user_stories.user_story: As a registered user, I want to log in using my credentials so that I can access my account.
acceptance_criteria: User can enter email and password to log in.
System validates credentials and grants access on success.
User is notified of incorrect credentials.
User can use 'Forgot Password' to reset credentials.
Login session persists until user logs out or session expires.

user_stories.title: Forgot Password
user_stories.user_story: As a user, I want to reset my password if I forget it so that I can regain access to my account.
acceptance_criteria: User can request a password reset link via email.
System sends a secure reset link to the registered email.
User can set a new password using the reset link.
System validates the new password strength.
User is notified upon successful password reset.

user_stories.title: Profile Management
user_stories.user_story: As a user, I want to view and edit my profile information so that I can keep my account details up to date.
acceptance_criteria: User can view profile information such as name, email, and profile picture.
User can edit and save changes to profile fields.
System validates updated information before saving.
User receives confirmation of successful updates.
Profile changes are reflected immediately.

user_stories.title: Change Password from Profile
user_stories.user_story: As a user, I want to change my password from my profile settings so that I can keep my account secure.
acceptance_criteria: User can enter current and new passwords.
System validates current password before allowing change.
System checks new password strength.
User receives confirmation of password change.
User is logged out from other sessions after password change.

user_stories.title: Browse Product CATFlog
user_stories.user_story: As a user, I want to browse the product cATFlog so that I can view available products.
acceptance_criteria: User can view a list of products with images and basic details.
Products are organized by categories and filters.
User can search for products by name or keyword.
Product details are displayed upon selection.
CATFlog updates in real-time as new products are added.

user_stories.title: Product Details View
user_stories.user_story: As a user, I want to view detailed information about a product so that I can make informed purchasing decisions.
acceptance_criteria: User can view product images, description, price, and specifications.
User can see product reviews and ratings.
User can view stock availability.
Related products are suggested.
Product details are accurate and up to date.

user_stories.title: Add Product to Cart
user_stories.user_story: As a user, I want to add products to my shopping cart so that I can purchase multiple items in one order.
acceptance_criteria: User can add products to the cart from the cATFlog or product details page.
System updates cart quantity and total price.
User can view cart contents at any time.
User is notified if product is out of stock.
Cart persists across sessions until checkout or removal.

user_stories.title: Update Cart Quantity
user_stories.user_story: As a user, I want to update the quantity of products in my cart so that I can adjust my order before checkout.
acceptance_criteria: User can increase or decrease product quantity in the cart.
System recalculates total price based on quantity.
User is notified if requested quantity exceeds stock.
Cart updates are reflected immediately.
User can remove items from the cart.

user_stories.title: Checkout Process
user_stories.user_story: As a user, I want to complete the checkout process so that I can purchase the products in my cart.
acceptance_criteria: User can enter shipping and billing information.
System validates all required fields before proceeding.
User can select a payment method.
Order summary is displayed before confirmation.
User receives order confirmation upon successful payment.

user_stories.title: Order History
user_stories.user_story: As a user, I want to view my past orders so that I can track my purchases and reorder items.
acceptance_criteria: User can view a list of previous orders with details.
Order status is displayed for each order.
User can reorder items from past orders.
Order details include product, quantity, price, and date.
User can filter orders by date or status.

user_stories.title: Product Reviews
user_stories.user_story: As a user, I want to leave reviews for products I have purchased so that I can share my experience with others.
acceptance_criteria: User can submit a review and rating for purchased products.
System validates that user has purchased the product.
Reviews are displayed on the product details page.
User can edit or delete their own reviews.
Review submission is confirmed to the user.

user_stories.title: Wishlist Feature
user_stories.user_story: As a user, I want to add products to a wishlist so that I can save items for future purchase.
acceptance_criteria: User can add products to their wishlist from the cATFlog or product details.
User can view and manage wishlist items.
User can move items from wishlist to cart.
Wishlist persists across sessions.
User can remove items from wishlist.

user_stories.title: Admin Product Management
user_stories.user_story: As an admin, I want to add, edit, and remove products from the cATFlog so that I can manage the available inventory.
acceptance_criteria: Admin can create new product entries with all required details.
Admin can edit existing product information.
Admin can remove products from the cATFlog.
System validates product dATF before saving.
Changes are reflected in the product cATFlog immediately.

user_stories.title: Admin Order Management
user_stories.user_story: As an admin, I want to view and update order statuses so that I can manage order fulfillment.
acceptance_criteria: Admin can view all orders with details.
Admin can update order status (e.g., processing, shipped, delivered).
Order status updates are visible to users.
System logs changes to order status.
Admin can filter orders by status or date.

user_stories.title: Admin User Management
user_stories.user_story: As an admin, I want to manage user accounts so that I can ensure platform security and support users.
acceptance_criteria: Admin can view all user accounts.
Admin can deactivate or delete user accounts.
Admin can reset user passwords.
System logs all admin actions on user accounts.
Admin can search and filter users by status or role.

user_stories.title: Email Notifications for Orders
user_stories.user_story: As a user, I want to receive email notifications for order updates so that I am informed about my order status.
acceptance_criteria: User receives email confirmation upon order placement.
User receives email updates for order status changes.
Emails include relevant order details.
User can opt out of email notifications.
Emails are sent in a timely manner.

user_stories.title: Search Functionality
user_stories.user_story: As a user, I want to search for products by name, category, or keyword so that I can quickly find what I need.
acceptance_criteria: User can enter search terms in a search bar.
System displays relevant products based on search.
Search results are sorted by relevance.
User can filter search results by category or price.
Search is responsive and fast.

user_stories.title: Responsive Design
user_stories.user_story: As a user, I want the platform to be responsive so that I can use it easily on any device.
acceptance_criteria: Platform layout adapts to different screen sizes.
All features are accessible on mobile, tablet, and desktop.
Images and text scale appropriately.
Navigation remains user-friendly across devices.
No functionality is lost on smaller screens.

summary: 20 comprehensive user stories have been generated covering user registration, login, password management, profile management, product cATFlog browsing, product details, cart management, checkout, order history, reviews, wishlist, admin management features, notifications, search, and responsive design.
